title: SALIOREL for institutions
description: Modern timetable display and news management solution for schools
story:
SALIOREL for institutions is a solution for cantonal schools which includes the tools Display, News and Manager.

Display and News are digital signage software that can display constantly up-to-date timetables and news provided by the school. With multiple built-in redudancies, this solution is highly reliable – even if the internet connection or servers go offline.

Displays using this technology can be remotely managed via SALIOREL Manager, which makes it easy to configure displays, present web content remotely and push news and announcement to displays and users of the SALIOREL Platform.

Today, this solution is used by the Kantonsschule Zürcher Oberland.
